c1.name: Infinite Circuit
c1.descriptionRaw:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.
c1.description:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

c2.name: Electromagnetic Field
c2.descriptionRaw:
Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:
路Increases DEF by 25%.
路Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.
c2.description:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:

路Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

c3.name: Resonant Thunder
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Plasma Eruption
c4.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.
c4.description: Lightning Rose now unleashes 1-3 lightning bolts when it attacks.

c5.name: Electrocute
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Pulsating Witch
c6.descriptionRaw:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.
